inclusion.criterion: admission with abdominal pain for up to one week prior to admission deemed to be non-specific by senior surgical team member
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient willing to give full informed consent for participation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: pain of greater than 7 days duration
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis.
